body:
We have a final announcement for the Radiance Workshop being held Sept. 
22-26 at LBNL in Berkeley, CA, posted on the Radiance website:


	http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/workshop/


We had to raise the registration a little based on the response and our 
estimated costs, but I hope everyone who said they would come will 
come, and will invite their friends as well....


Please note that we are holding a photo contest for the second time, in 
hopes of getting some cool new Radiance images to show off.


On the web page, you will also find some information on transportation 
and housing, and if you have any comments or questions, please send 
e-mail to <workshop@radsite.lbl.gov>, and we will respond as quickly as 
possible.


Thanks!
-Greg
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2003-August/000937.html).</sup>
